title: 游戏崩溃了！！！！！！！！！！！求大神帮帮忙啊~~~~标题长才不会被拐走~~~~
author: 天命小猪
txt_content:
这是我装的MOD：




QQ图片20130704114944.jpg (19.72 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2013-7-4 11:50 上传





这是崩溃的情况：

      Minecraft has crashed!

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to D:\MC\Minecraft147\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-04_11.51.17-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: songfeitong
replies.txt_content: 可能是内存不够崩溃了，也可能是mod冲突，可以少装几个mod。小地图、TMI、、高清修复、R键整理就够了。
